about_the_game:
I am a magic helper doll. I was given to Vasilisa by her mother before she died. If you feed me and say the right words, I come to life and help my mistress.

After the death of his wife, Vasilisa's father grieved and grieved, but ended up remarrying. The stepmother does not like Vasilisa, every day she makes her do a lot of housework. Vasilisa feeds me in the evenings, and I help her. I do the work and at night I watch out for evil in the house. And there's actually a lot of evil around the stepmother's house!




An action adventure game in which you, as a magic doll, will fight evil spirits at night. You will be met by malicious opponents - a bannik, a ovinnik and a kikimora. Find a way to defeat them in a fair fight and teach them a lesson so that they will remember it for a long time!

• Explore the yard, the wheat field and the river bank
• Collect a collection of strange objects
• Learn more about the evil spirits that live in the area
• And teach these evil spirits a lesson!
detailed_description:
I am a magic helper doll. I was given to Vasilisa by her mother before she died. If you feed me and say the right words, I come to life and help my mistress.

After the death of his wife, Vasilisa's father grieved and grieved, but ended up remarrying. The stepmother does not like Vasilisa, every day she makes her do a lot of housework. Vasilisa feeds me in the evenings, and I help her. I do the work and at night I watch out for evil in the house. And there's actually a lot of evil around the stepmother's house!




An action adventure game in which you, as a magic doll, will fight evil spirits at night. You will be met by malicious opponents - a bannik, a ovinnik and a kikimora. Find a way to defeat them in a fair fight and teach them a lesson so that they will remember it for a long time!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra (10.13)
  • Processor: Intel core i5, 1.5 GHz and up
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb dedicated video card, shader model 3.0+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Vasilisa and Baba Yaga: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 AF
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030, AMD Radeon R7 240 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Level up the magical assistant doll Vasilisa the Beautiful from the famous fairy tale, who fights evil spirits at night, so that later the path to Baba Yaga will be easier!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
